casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cincinnati, Inc., Appellant, v. Lowe et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cincinnati, Inc. v. Lowe, 109 Ohio St.3d 80, 2006-Ohio-1927.]

*81(No. 2005-0546 Submitted March 14, 2006 Decided May 3, 2006.) Dinsmore & Shohl, L.L.P., Gary E. Becker, and Theresa M. Muhic, for appellant. Weisser & Wolf and Lisa M. Clark, for appellee Robert W. Lowe. Jim Petro, Attorney General, and Kevin J. Reis, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
